About Us This game is called “Pika Runner”. It is a simple endless runner game. In this game, you are the pikachu and you need to run as far as you can on a road. The farer you go, the higher score you get. There will be monsters which block you on the road. You need to dodge them or kill them with items when they are getting closer.
The user taps the left part of the screen for moving left and taps the right part of the screen for moving right. Like many game used, it helps player skilled in control. They can use an item by clicking it on the items bar on the right of the road.
The difficulty level of the game varies with the score the user gets. When their score reaches the milestones, the game will become more difficult. More monster will appear on the road and they will speed up also accordimg to the level of diffiiculty. Initial game level can be chosen for player challenges.
